description.narrative: By 2018, local governments have enhanced capacities to address issues of children, rights and equity in the planning and implementation of development plans in areas of competence transferred in accordance with the provisions of the Convention. Act 3 of Decentralization, which contributes to Adolescent Empowerment, Children In Urban Settings / Local Governance, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Public Finance And Local Governance, Social Protection. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Harnessing Power Of Business And Markets, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2018, children, especially the most vulnerable, benefit from better support for their needs in targeting, public financial management, and social protection mechanisms.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2018, local governments have enhanced capacities to address issues of children, rights and equity in the planning and implementation of development plans in areas of competence transferred in accordance with the provisions of the Convention. Act 3 of Decentralization

description.narrative: In 2018, eighteen new communities became Child Friendly Territorial Communities, through capacity building of local actors to develop participatory budgets and child-centered local plans, and organizing children's councils. UNICEF supported the National Territorial Observatory to generate online-dashboards for users (including external) to monitor progress made against child-related indicators. | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/01/2019

title.narrative: Nombre de Collectivits Locales avec un plan et un budget refltant les priorits communautaires des groupes marginaliss, des femmes et des enfants (07-03)
4.9 Local governments (incl. municipalities) with functioning mechanisms for child/adolescent and/or community participation in local planning, budgeting and monitoring processes
